_comment: Egg SA-MP (0.3.7 R2-1) - No RCON Version by ZaleeHost
name: SA-MP (0.3.7 R2-1 - No RCON)
author: support@zaleehost.qzz.io
description: San Andreas Multiplayer Dedicated Server (v0.3.7 R2-1) tanpa RCON password. Aman dan ringan untuk server publik.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /tmp || exit
echo "Downloading SA-MP 0.3.7 R2-1 Server (No RCON)..."
curl -sSL -o samp.tar.gz https://files.sa-mp.com/samp037svr_R2-1.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server
tar -xzf samp.tar.gz --strip-components=1 -C /mnt/server
rm -f samp.tar.gz
cd /mnt/server || exit
chmod +x samp03svr
mkdir -p scriptfiles
echo "hostname ${SERVER_NAME}" > /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "gamemode0 grandlarc 1" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "port {{server.build.default.port}}" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "maxplayers 50" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "announce 1" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "query 1" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "weburl www.sa-mp.com" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "onfoot_rate 40" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "incar_rate 40" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "weapon_rate 40" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "stream_distance 300.0" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "stream_rate 1000" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "plugins streamer.so" >> /mnt/server/server.cfg
echo "--------------------------------------"
echo "SA-MP No RCON installation finished!"
echo "--------------------------------------"

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Nama yang akan muncul di browser SA-MP.
